info.name: Charles Archer
info.description: Welcome to my digital portfolio! I'm Charles Archer, a dynamic Software Engineer with a passion for crafting innovative solutions. My expertise lies in developing mission-critical software and advanced simulations, as showcased in my work in the aerospace industry. I thrive on enhancing system accuracy and reliability, leveraging languages like C++, Lua, and Python. Explore my diverse projects, from pioneering aerospace initiatives to creating a cryptocurrency trading bot and web applications for Non-Fungible Token projects. With a robust skill set in languages, frameworks, and cloud technologies, I am dedicated to driving future advancements in the field. Let's explore the possibilities together.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: In my role at Lockheed Martin, I design and develop software for a high fidelity flight simulation training environment...

projects.title: Buxon Development Group
projects.description: I supported this Non-Fungible Token project by designing and developing the web applications to support its blockchain utility...

projects.title: Staking Platforms
projects.description: I spearheaded the front-end design and development of Solana staking platforms for several NFT projects...
